h2_title: How to Parry Enemy Attacks in Black Myth: Wukong
content: Each enemy will have different timings to their attacks, however, so it might take some practice getting it right for the different Yaoguais. Look for visual prompts such as enemies raising their weapons and shields or leaning back to spot the start of their attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Parry.md', within the main section titled 'How to Parry', specifically from the subsection 'How to Parry Enemy Attacks in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
Each enemy will have different timings to their attacks, however, so it might take some practice getting it right for the different Yaoguais. Look for visual prompts such as enemies raising their weapons and shields or leaning back to spot the start of their attacks.
